message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18000 is a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $15500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $15800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $15500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14800.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $15200.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $14500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $14200.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. This is my final offer.
